idea-plugin.name: WxbYapiUpload
idea-plugin.description:
upload api to yapi
support dubbo api and api upload （Base on YapiIdeaUploadPlugin）
idea-plugin.change-notes:
2.0.1:
fixbug Latest use
2.0.0:
- Migrate configuration files from the idea directory and migrate to the src/main/resources directory. The main consideration is that the .idea folder is generally ignored. The reason for ignoring is to avoid additional conflicts when different developers collaborate.        - Uploaded if the class name or method name is not selected. By default, the main class in the current file is uploaded, which reduces operating costs and learning costs.        - When the class contained in the generic is a base class, the generic field is directly used as the base type.        - Map types in Java and types of Yapi to ensure consistency so that mock data is automatically generated.        - Added support for enumeration properties, enumeration array properties        - Modify the bug
1.7.4:
- compatible with older versions         - Support unified return value setting         - Added default to class name upload         - enumeration field parsing         - Unify multi-module parameters to solve enumeration packaging problems,
1.7.3:
- Support map, solve same package problems, remove cache, support notblank, support package menu
1.7.2:
- Added support for localdata, localTime, localDataTime

1.7.1:
- Support for custom descriptions not covered (crazy branch support)         - Menu acquisition process modification (crazy branch support)         - Support status @status comment         - Support multi-level classification (crazy branch support)
1.7.0:
- @menu: problem, support dubbo         - Support multiple link downloads         - Upload results into the clipboard         - link same package problem
1.6.9:
- fix deleteMapping and patchMapping - fix menu bug - Support get entity class receiving
1.6.8:
- Support for class level path references         - Support multiple entity reception         - Support Response> Generics 1.6.7:
- Supplementary support for A, B, E, K, V generics         - Support for PathVariable
1.6.6:
- Support XXXMapping does not write value         - Resolve response <> Display in comments         - Support request param Remarks get from comments
1.6.5:
- fixbug request is a bug such as List         - fix code.zip Probabilistically the same problem         - fix HttpServletRequest&HttpServletResponse exists in Req_body_type type problem
1.6.4:
- Support class level classification definition
1.6.3:
fix Multi-level generic problem - Support @NotNull annotations - Support for PutMapping, DeleteMapping, - Support model receiving parameters and application/x-www-form-urlencoded - Support for custom classifications
